column2: This table gives Attic inflectional endings. For declension in dialects other than Attic, see Appendix:Ancient Greek dialectal declension.

column1: Asturian: oligárquicu  English: oligarchic  French: oligarchique  Greek: ολιγαρχικός ‎(oligarchikós)
column3: Italian: oligarchico  Latin oligarchicus  Portuguese: oligárquico  Spanish: oligárquico
